entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who feels powerless without his own wand. He watches Umbridge with concern.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a professor who is forcing Harry to do something against his will. She mentions that she has no choice and that the Minister will understand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another student who tries to stop Umbridge from using the Cruciatus Curse. She reminds Umbridge that it's illegal.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is watching Umbridge with a hungry expression on his face.

relationships.description: Umbridge is forcing Harry to do something against his will.
Hermione tries to stop Umbridge from using the Cruciatus Curse.
